Welcome to very-simple-package-braveGrumpy's documentation!
===========================================================

**Very Simple Package** is a python package that holds a single class, Arithmetic. The Arithmetic object has two methods, one for addition, and one for multiplication.

Check out hte :doc: `usage` section for further information, including how to :ref:`install <installation>` the project

.. note::

    This project is a test project, and under development.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
